fields.body:
The four CRUD operations

Let's look at the Web application in terms of CRUD operations.
Creating widgets

Now that initial setup is complete, you need to write code that manages the widgets. Start with the first of the four CRUD operations: create. This code must save user input as a widget in the database.

Start by creating an HTML form with fields corresponding to the structure of the student table. Create a view file called student_add.php in the .\system\application\views\ folder, shown in Listing 5.
Listing 5. Generating HTML form fields for the create operation
fields.title: Test 1

fields.body:
Hello Ziya and your family,

We are two french guys who have begun a long travel from the Western of France (Quimper if ever you know) in order to join Beijing, the capital of China, with our bikes! The project is called "Quimper Pékin à Vélo" (in French) and we also have created a website (www.quimperpekinavelo.com) and a facebook page (Facebook.com/Quimperpekinavelo).

We should arrive around Baku for the 20th or 21st of February 2015.

We wonder wether you would be available and you might host us for 1 or 2 nights. But if is too difficult for you to host two guys we can understand obviously, just please let us know...

We are both engineers in sustainable buildings and during our trip, we want to study old architecture and especially old houses of the countries which we travel trough in order to know the traditionnal skills and know-how.

We thank you for your attention to our message.

If ever we don't respond cause we don't often have internet access, here is our phone number if ever you can send an sms or via whatsapp: 0033 6 47 42 68 96 (Vincent).

Regards,

Simon and Vincent
fields.title: Test 2

fields.body: Nous sommes deux cyclo-touristes partis de Quimper le 13 Septembre 2014 et en partance pour Pékin. Ce voyage devrait durer un an et nous amener à traverser une vingtaine de pays. Lors de ce voyage, nous tentons d'étudier l'architecture traditionnelle et ancienne des régions traversées, travaillant auparavant dans le secteur de la construction durable. Nous dormons de temps en temps sous la tente mais ce que nous préférons c'est d'être hébergés chez des hôtes et d'entamer la discussion avec eux, le temps d'une soirée. Alors si en plus, le logement représente un témoignage du patrimoine architectural, c'est l'idéal! A bientôt nous l'espérons si vous vous trouvez sur notre chemin. Simon & Vincent, quimperpekinavelo.com
fields.title: Test 3

fields.body:
7) Android Virtual Device (AVD) add

Create a new Android Virtual Device for your access. Click Create button to add new AVD on your android emulator. NoteClick tools button to launch AVD creation window. If it is not showing maximize the current windows and get the tools button.
